channel.title: Projects on Deborah Popoola
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Deborah Popoola

item.title: BiochemRAG: Domain-Specific Biochemistry RAG System
item.description: Developed a specialized Retrieval-Augmented Generation system for biochemistry education, targeting amino acid and nucleotide biosynthesis from Lehninger Principles of Biochemistry. Built with Mistral-7B-Instruct, sentence-transformers, and ChromaDB for semantic search and scientifically accurate response generation.

item.title: Malaria Incidence Rate Predictive Model
item.description: Developed an advanced machine learning model to predict malaria incidence rates across Africa as part of Team GitLab "The Visionaries" during Hamoye internship. Conducted spatial analysis using Global Moran's statistics, integrated population-based metrics, and achieved high RÂ² scores to enable proactive outbreak prediction and precision-targeted control strategies.

item.title: Project 3: Danny Ma's 8 weeks SQL Challenge
item.description: Unlocked the power of SQL! I crushed Danny Ma’s 8-Week Challenge, mastering both fundamental and advanced techniques through real-world scenarios. From optimizing retail inventory to predicting customer behavior, I tackled diverse business challenges head-on, showcasing my proficiency in database manipulation, data analysis, and creative problem-solving. Ready to see how I leverage SQL for impactful insights and strategic decision-making? Explore my solutions and prepare to be amazed! github repo

item.title: Intelligent Food Assistant Chatbot with Rasa Framework
item.description: Built a conversational AI assistant using Rasa framework with natural language understanding capabilities. Integrated with Spoonacular API for recipe search, nutritional analysis, meal planning, and wine pairing suggestions. Deployed on Slack for seamless workplace accessibility.

item.title: Neural Text Summarization with Fine-tuned BART
item.description: Fine-tuned Facebook's BART-large-CNN model for domain-specific text summarization using custom dataset. Implemented end-to-end pipeline including data preprocessing, model fine-tuning with Hugging Face Transformers, and evaluation on 100 test samples with optimized generation parameters.

item.title: Deepseek-R1-Distill-Llama-70b RAG System for Mental Health Research
item.description: Developed a specialized Retrieval-Augmented Generation system leveraging Deepseek-R1-Distill-Llama-70b to analyze 504,913 PubMed articles on suicide, mental health, and depression. Built with HuggingFace embeddings, FAISS vector storage, and advanced LLM integration to provide evidence-based insights for researchers, clinicians, and policymakers.

item.title: DSM-5-TR Clinical RAG System for Trauma & Stress Disorders
item.description: Developed a specialized Retrieval-Augmented Generation system that transforms how mental health clinicians access DSM-5-TR diagnostic information. Using advanced semantic search and intelligent document processing, the system reduces diagnostic lookup time from minutes to seconds while maintaining clinical accuracy. Enables natural language queries like "What are the diagnostic criteria for Acute Stress Disorder?" with sub-second response times.
